Title: Pilot: The First Seventeen Hours
Plot: After a nuclear disaster caused by several terrorist attacks wipes out most of North America, residents of a small Kansas town have to come to terms with a very different reality.
GuestStars: Taylor Nichols, Leon Russom, Joey King, Joseph Castanon, Germaine De Leon, Beau Dremann, Steve Hibbert, Helena Barrett, Madison Pettis, Mackenzie Hannigan, Al Vincente, Marlene Forte, Thom Williams, Robert C. Koc
